response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's true value and your appreciation for it. I trust this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
